Issue.creator: dsurnin
Issue.summary: Client and node config parameter MSG_LEN_LIMIT mismatch
Issue.description: For the moment parameter MSG_LEN_LIMIT is stored in config. In case client and node are run on different machines the configs are different. If node's MSG_LEN_LIMIT is smaller than client's MSG_LEN_LIMIT it is possible that client can send big txn but node *silently ignore* it and client does not receive any response - just wait. It leads to crash on exit since connection still opened.
